name: FireSquad
description:
FireSquad is a strategy game about firefighting.
You control a group of 4 firefighters whose job is to rescue people from burning buildings.

Gameplay


  • Control the spread of the fire, make sure it does not reach critical spots,
  • Clear the way to the entrance so that the firefighters can bring survivors to safety.
  • Be prepared to adapt your strategy when the fire spreads



  • Search for survivals in cabinets, beds, and other places where people try to hide from the fire.



  • Upgrade your squad between levels to gain leverage.




  • You will dynamically increase the difficulty of the game by selecting level modifiers at certain points in the game.


Features

  • Fast-paced gameplay
  • Semi-randomized levels to keep the experience fresh each time you play
  • Three types of buildings with different features
  • Squad upgrades
  • Dynamic difficulty selection
